title: Upper, Middle, Lower Campus closed again today Released: 10h25, 20 October 2015 (University of Cape ...
text: ( Source : University of Cape Town ) Dear colleagues and students This morning we made the decision again to close down the Upper, Lower and Middle Campuses at the University of Cape Town. Again , we do so because protesters barricaded entrance
